original_title: Warrawong… the windy place on the hill
overview: Not an easy decision, given their ages, and the fact that they live over 80km from the nearest chemist and almost double that to the nearest doctor. It’s a pleasure to spend time with Brian as he weighs the ewes and lambs for sale, or with Sue at the CWA’s ‘sip and sew’. There’s a timelessness, but also a sense of impending change in this precise Australian story.
tagline: Sue and Brian are in a couple in their 70s, determined to stay on their remote farm for the rest of their lives.
title: Warrawong… the windy place on the hill
